title: The 4 controversial #SixChairChallenge swaps on the X Factor that had Twitter up in arms
text:
The 4 controversial #SixChairChallenge swaps on the X Factor that had Twitter up in arms The 4 controversial #SixChairChallenge swaps on the X Factor that had Twitter up in arms 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Tonightâ€™s X Factor was a tense two hours of the girls battling it out for a chance to sit in one of the six chairs at the side of the stage, guaranteeing them a place in the next stage of the competition. Love the six chair challenge. Think it's my new favourite part of the auditions. #XFactor 
â€” Matteo Davies (@MatthewDavies__) October 4, 2015 
Twitter all agreed on one thing: The challenge, where a girl can be swapped by Rita for another who she believes is more deserving, is a lengthy and brutal process. the six chair challenge is so cruelðŸ˜’ #XFactor
